text: Ben Kingree III (September 7, 1934 - March 6, 2015) was an American politician and lawyer. Born in Shelbyville, Tennessee, Kingree served in the United States Marine Corps. He then received his bachelor's and law degrees from Vanderbilt University. He practiced law in Shelbyville, Tennessee. Kingree served in the Tennessee House of Representatives from 1967 to 1969 and was a Democrat. In 1972, Kingree moved to Atlanta, Georgia and practiced law. He died in Hilton Head Island, South Carolina where he lived.Ben Kingree III- obituaryBen Kingree III-Mediation.com85th Tennessee General Assembly Ben Kingree II ==Notes== Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Politicians from Atlanta Category:People from Shelbyville, Tennessee Category:Military personnel from Tennessee Category:Vanderbilt University alumni Category:Vanderbilt University Law School alumni Category:Georgia (U.S. state) lawyers Category:Tennessee lawyers Category:Tennessee Democrats Category:Members of the Tennessee House of Representatives Category:People from Hilton Head, South Carolina
title: Ben Kingree
